description: Generic eval set for Angular code search quality - 20 semantic queries
notes: Queries designed to test SEMANTIC understanding, not keyword matching. Expected patterns are file name patterns that should match, not full paths.

queries.notes: Should find player API with next() method. Tests understanding 'skip' -> 'next'
Should find player API with setVolume() method. Tests 'adjust volume' concept
Should find local-storage service. Tests understanding persistence concept

queries.query: add authorization token to API requests
queries.notes: Should find auth interceptor. Tests understanding of auth headers

queries.query: handle side effects from user actions
queries.notes: Should find NgRx effects. Tests understanding of side effect pattern
Should find player API with transferUserPlayback(). Tests device switching concept

queries.query: remember user settings after page reload
queries.notes: Should find local-storage or settings services. Tests persistence concept
Should find player API with getRecentPlayedTracks(). Tests history concept
Should find google-analytics service. Tests tracking concept
Should find album API with getUserSavedAlbums(). Tests library concept
Should find unauthorized interceptor. Tests error handling + auth

queries.query: manage application state for music albums
queries.notes: Should find album store/reducer. Tests state management + domain

queries.query: dispatch actions to update UI state
queries.notes: Should find *.action.ts files. Tests NgRx action concept
Should find browse/categories API or store. Tests discovery + data fetching
Should find *.selector.ts files. Tests NgRx selector concept
Exact class name lookup. Should find album-api.ts
Exact class name lookup. Should find playlist-api.ts
Exact class name lookup. Should find local-storage.service.ts
Framework-specific pattern. Should find *.effect.ts files
Framework-specific pattern. Should find *.interceptor.ts files
